message:
Non-alert monitor

This monitor notifies when the job-digest-to-iterable pubsub subscription has stopped processing messages. This could be when a job fails, or when the subscription has been cleared of messages. [Pubsub: job-digest-to-iterable subscription has old messages](https://app.datadoghq.com/monitors/73581573) will notify when there are messages present on the subscription for a significant amount of time.

The two monitors are used in the composite monitor, [Pubsub: job-digest-to-iterable subscription stopped processing old messages](https://app.datadoghq.com/monitors/73581742), which will notify when the messages are present on the subscription AND are not being processed. See this monitor for more info on how to handle incident.
name: Pubsub: job-digest-to-iterable subscription is not processing messages
